content:
# After waiting for 30 seconds, it appears that the Stone Furnace did not produce any Iron Plates, and my inventory remains unchanged with 6 units of iron ore.
# This indicates that the furnace may not have enough ingredients to continue smelting, despite being in a "WORKING" state.

# The furnace currently has 4 units of iron ore available for smelting, but it seems that it is not processing them into plates.
# I will check the furnace's inventory again to verify its contents and status.

print(f"Inventory of the Stone Furnace: {inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)}")  # Inspecting the furnace's inventory again. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the current entities on the map for any issues.
